pages.text: This augment can only be added to the $(l:modules/vacuum)Vacuum Module/$. It allows the Vacuum Module to ignore the normal pickup delay on dropped items - 40 ticks for items dropped by players, and 10 ticks for items dropped by other means (e.g. sheep shearing) - and pick up items as soon as it sees them.$(p)A max of one Fast Pickup Augment can be added.
